metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24335 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in uIP through 1.0, as used in Contiki and Contiki-NG. Domain name parsing lacks bounds checks, allowing an attacker to corrupt memory with crafted DNS packets.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per upstream developers, open-iscsi wasn't affected by this CVE

criterions.comment: open-iscsi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
